1.title: Death of Youth

episode of.title: A Stranger in My Home (TV Series 2013– )

1.plot: Almost 50-year-old Brian Geddes invites 22-year-old Jordan Shaver into his home, but she decides to start a new life with someone else. And when Brian becomes MIA, his home reveals chaos, drugs, a gun, and a bloody secret... devastating all involved.

2.title: Mean Girls

episode of.title: A Stranger in My Home (TV Series 2013– )

2.plot: When Brandy Stevens-Rosine and Jade Olmstead meet online in 2010, the pairing quickly catches fire. But when the fire dies, and a strange girl moves in, jealousy, murder, and mayhem ensue - all carefully captured in horrifically intimate diaries.

3.title: The Two-Faced Murder

episode of.title: A Stranger in My Home (TV Series 2013– )

3.plot: An old man collapses in his bathroom, gasping for air. The caregiver tries to save him while her son calls for help in vain. This "accident" isn't what it seems, though... and the true story reveals murder.

4.title: Murder in Aspen

episode of.title: A Stranger in My Home (TV Series 2013– )

4.plot: Aspen socialite Nancy Pfister has it all, including close friends and even closer enemies. When new tenants move into her chalet, jealously, unpaid rent, and simmering resentments leave one dead and the others locked in a bloody, silent conspiracy.

5.title: Princes and Paupers

episode of.title: A Stranger in My Home (TV Series 2013– )

5.plot: Clifford Lambert is missing. The Palm Springs socialite has been living happily in his lavishly decorated house for years. But after looking for love, the lonely art dealer instead finds a vicious nest of thieves, con artists, and murderers.

6.title: The Burn Pile

episode of.title: A Stranger in My Home (TV Series 2013– )

6.plot: Police are baffled when a mysterious burn pile at the side of a farmhouse reveals charred human remains. The bingo-loving homeowner is missing, and so too is his live-in help and her boyfriend. What turned this happy farmstead into a place of horror?

7.title: Good Bones

episode of.title: A Stranger in My Home (TV Series 2013– )

7.plot: When a Brooklyn co-op owner, his friendly handyman, and a greedy real estate owner fight over money and possible tenants, one person goes missing and another gets away with murder. For years. Until a lucky break finally sends one to the slammer.

8.title: Shades of Jade

episode of.title: A Stranger in My Home (TV Series 2013– )

8.plot: A lonely ex-military man and a much younger woman meet and fall in love, but greed, worry and secrets leaves one dead and the other on the run.

9.title: Master Manipulators

episode of.title: A Stranger in My Home (TV Series 2013– )

9.plot: Two bodies are found in a dumpster, mangled and bloody. With only tattoos to identify them, police desperately hunt for their names - and their two housemates. Could they be victims of foul play too? Or is this something more sinister?

10.title: Deadly Love Nest

episode of.title: A Stranger in My Home (TV Series 2013– )

10.plot: Housemates Jenny, Jake, and Steve share everything, including each other's beds. But when one is brutally attacked, police uncover a nest of lies, jealousy, and betrayal. This leads them to ask: was it really an intruder... or was it an inside job?

1.title: House of Horrors

episode of.title: A Stranger in My Home (TV Series 2013– )

1.plot: In Sacramento, Dorothea Puente runs a boardinghouse. Mentally ill Alvaro Â'Bert' Montoya is among Dorothea's favorite tenants. Until a terrible stench rises up through the rafters, and Bert unwittingly exposes something sinister... And deadly.

2.title: Trailer Park Terror

episode of.title: A Stranger in My Home (TV Series 2013– )

2.plot: Mickey Widmer and her boyfriend Darnell Mears move into a Minnesota trailer park looking for a fresh start, but after meeting Rick Taber, a reclusive neighbor, he grows too close for comfort. Good neighbors go bad; and bad neighbors spill blood.

3.title: Buried Secrets

episode of.title: A Stranger in My Home (TV Series 2013– )

3.plot: Al Kowalski is new to Hill Country, Texas. He plans to spend his early retirement hunting and fixing his vintage vehicles. Al welcomes meth-addicted mechanic Charlie Tidwell into his home to help with the cars, but Charlie has a different plan.

4.title: The Co-Ed Killer

episode of.title: A Stranger in My Home (TV Series 2013– )

4.plot: Michelle Herndon is an anthropology student studying at the University of Florida. Just one month before graduation Michelle takes a stranger under her wing with devastating consequences, leaving friends and family baffled, and their lives shattered.

5.title: Death Comes Knocking

episode of.title: A Stranger in My Home (TV Series 2013– )

5.plot: John Adair is a wealthy philanthropist who champions charitable causes and fosters troubled teens. When John Adair opens his luxurious California home to a stranger in need, the invitation will end in a horrific blood bath.

6.title: The Killer Clown

episode of.title: A Stranger in My Home (TV Series 2013– )

6.plot: John Aegerter, runs a thriving communications company in Brookfield, WI. He's an eccentric millionaire who lives alone in a large house and an invitation he extends to an old friend will culminate in unimaginable violence.

7.title: Death by Lottery

episode of.title: A Stranger in My Home (TV Series 2013– )

7.plot: Abraham Shakespeare, 40, wins 30 million dollars in a FL 2006 Lottery. Suddenly, lots of "friends" are glad to help spend it. Dee Dee Moore, 36, offered in 2008 to start a company with Shakespeare, to protect her partner from these "users." Told to downsize, etc., he dutifully listens. Yet, soon after, Shakespeare goes missing. He enjoyed traveling, though would never leave his children. Eventually, the mystery is solved--a "Shakespearean Tragedy" in it's own right.

8.title: Hired from Hell

episode of.title: A Stranger in My Home (TV Series 2013– )

8.plot: Roxanna and Percy Palomino are living the American dream. Recent immigrants to the US, they've worked hard for their happy home. But when things go missing, tempers flare, and Roxanna ends up struggling for her life with a dangerous and unexpected foe.

9.title: Mommy Dearest

episode of.title: A Stranger in My Home (TV Series 2013– )

9.plot: An ex-convict is hired by 82 year old Mabel Pugliese and her troubled daughter to help them take care of their new home.

10.title: Roommate from Hell

episode of.title: A Stranger in My Home (TV Series 2013– )

10.plot: When Jeffrey Wheatley moves to Stockton, California he sees it as a second chance. His friend Drew offers him a room in a house that he shares with Valerie Nessler. But soon, the house will be the setting of the most brutal murder the town has ever seen.

1.title: Star-Crossed Murder

episode of.title: A Stranger in My Home (TV Series 2013– )

1.plot: Air traffic controller Gene Thurnau moves to St-Petersburg, Florida to start over. He meets Jaye-Jaye, and soon they marry and begin building their dream home. But ghosts from Gene's past bring unwanted tension and horror into their perfect home.

2.title: Thorny Rose of Texas

episode of.title: A Stranger in My Home (TV Series 2013– )

2.plot: Buddy Musso lives a simple life at a New Jersey retirement community. But, he longs for romance. When Buddy meets Suzanne Basso at a fair, love takes him to Texas where a house full of strangers quickly turns his hopeful dreams into a waking nightmare.

3.title: Pregnant Pause

episode of.title: A Stranger in My Home (TV Series 2013– )

3.plot: Darlene's a young mother who's pregnant again. It should be joyful, but with a rocky relationship, she's anxious. Things look up when she meets Julie, another mother-to-be. But in just a matter of months, the women's lives shift from hopeful to horrific.

4.title: Evil in the House of the Lord

episode of.title: A Stranger in My Home (TV Series 2013– )

4.plot: In Nashville, a fire engulfs a church. Once the flames are out, firefighters find a burned body and it appears to be the church pastor, Reverend David Terry. The body has been dismembered - beheaded and the last man to see him alive is missing.

5.title: Bitter Pills

episode of.title: A Stranger in My Home (TV Series 2013– )

5.plot: Tampa grandmother Peggy Mehrman is much loved by friends and family. Peggy is forced to rely on the kindness of strangers when her heath declines, and when Peggy dies in her sleep, her daughter Janice's grief is soon transformed into suspicion.

6.title: Death's Final Cut

episode of.title: A Stranger in My Home (TV Series 2013– )

6.plot: In the desert region of Southern California, a once grand manor is bought by B-movie horror director Al Adamson, who plans to renovate it and sell. What no one imagines is that in June 1995, the home will become a real life horror movie.

imdb.plot outline: Your house should be a place where we feel most comfortable, but to someone who wants to pose a threat, there's no better way to get inside your life than to get inside your home. Let the wrong person in and it could be the last mistake you ever make.
imdb.title: A Stranger in My Home
plot: Your house should be a place where we feel most comfortable, but to someone who wants to pose a threat, there's no better way to get inside your life than to get inside your home. Let the wrong person in and it could be the last mistake you ever make.
synopsis: Your house should be a place where we feel most comfortable, but to someone who wants to pose a threat, there's no better way to get inside your life than to get inside your home. Let the wrong person in and it could be the last mistake you ever make. A STRANGER IN MY HOME is an exciting, hour-long documentary series that is the perfect blend of mystery and suspense, telling the true stories of what happens when strangers come together under one roof and begin new relationships. You might think you can trust this new acquaintance, but looks can be deceiving.
